title: Muted Tones and Pastel Palettes
description: One-minute skill: Muted Tones and Pastel Palettes.

hook.text: Not every photo needs to scream. Muted tones whisper â€” and sometimes a whisper is more powerful.

buildup.text: Muted colors are desaturated hues mixed with gray. Pastels are tints â€” hues mixed with white.

discovery.text: Muted palettes evoke nostalgia, calm, and softness. They're popular in film emulation and vintage aesthetics.

twist.text: Social media trends shift between hyper-saturated and muted styles every few years. Neither is objectively better.

climax.text: The choice between vivid and muted is emotional. What feeling does the image demand? Let that guide your palette.

punchline.text: Quiet colors speak louder than you'd expect.

quiz.question: What emotional quality do muted tones typically convey?
